definitions.definition: a religious or solemn ceremony consisting of a series of actions performed according to a prescribed order.
examples: the ancient rituals of Christian worship

definitions.definition: the prescribed order of performing a ceremony, especially one characteristic of a particular religion or church.
examples: ceremony, rite, ceremonial, observance; Moreservice, sacrament, liturgy, worship; act, practice, custom, tradition, convention, formality, procedure, protocol "an elaborate civic ritual"Moreservice, sacrament, liturgy, worship; act, practice, custom, tradition, convention, formality, procedure, protocol an elaborate civic ritual

definitions.definition: a series of actions or type of behavior regularly and invariably followed by someone.
examples: her visits to Joy became a ritual

definitions.definition: of, relating to, or done as a religious or solemn rite.
(of an action) arising from convention or habit.
examples: the players gathered for the ritual pregame huddle
